text: Can smart content be loaded based on “HubSpot Events”?
for example, if I have event where someone clicked on a specific link on a page, when they load that page can I update that pages content for them?

Hi all, hope you are doing good.
I am db developer with 9y+ exp and also finishing my Python course. Already signed up for HubSpot developer account and tried api. Based on my short skills description, what do you think would be the best way to integrate data (means fetching all available data on regular basis) from HubSpot into Postgres db? Maybe someone already described this in some doc.
Please advise.
Is there any way to have a lead flow show on a page without waiting the 7 seconds?
Can I associate a contact who was added by API with a particular campaign? If so, how? Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:
